mapper.select: select t.id as assessment_id, t.own_assessment as own_assessment, t.expert_assessment as expert_assessment, t.manager_assessment as manager_assessment, t.final_assessment as final_assessment, t.date_of_assessment as date_of_assessment, t.is_active as is_active from assessments t where t.id = #{id}

select t.id as assessment_id, t.own_assessment as own_assessment, t.expert_assessment as expert_assessment, t.manager_assessment as manager_assessment, t.final_assessment as final_assessment, t.date_of_assessment as date_of_assessment, t.is_active as is_active from assessments t join employees_assessments ea on t.id = ea.assessment_id where ea.employee_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE assessments SET own_assessment = #{ownAssessment}, expert_assessment = #{expertAssessment}, manager_assessment = #{managerAssessment}, final_assessment = #{finalAssessment}, date_of_assessment = #{dateOfAssessment}, is_active = #{isActive} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assessments (own_assessment, expert_assessment, manager_assessment, final_assessment, date_of_assessment, is_active) VALUES (#{ownAssessment}, #{expertAssessment}, #{managerAssessment}, #{finalAssessment}, #{dateOfAssessment}, #{isActive})
